member.name: T:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor
member.summary:
It is act as a proxy between the browser and server. Read the http request from the browser then send that http request to server then receive response finally send response to browser.
Author: Rasith

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.Process
member.summary: Process request from browser.

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.ServerProcess
member.summary: Send request to server and get response from server.

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.ReceiveRequestHeader
member.summary: Receive request header from browser stream.

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.ReceiveRequestBody(System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient,System.Int32,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Read request body from browser stream.
member.param: Tcp client from browser
Content length
To store content

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.SendRequest(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Send request to the server.
member.param: Server stream

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.ReceiveResponseHeader(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Receive response header from server stream.
member.param: Server stream

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.ReceiveResponseBody(System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient,System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Receive response body
member.param: Server tcp client
Server stream
content length
To store content

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.WriteToBrowser(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write response to browser stream.
member.param: Data
Starting point
Length

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.SetUrl
member.summary: Set URL variable value from response header.

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.ReceiveHeader(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Read http header from given stream.

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.ReceiveGZipHeader(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Read http header from given GZip stream.

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.GetContentLength(System.String)
member.summary: Parse content length from http header.
member.param: http header

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.GetResponseCode(System.String)
member.summary: Parse response code from http header.
member.param: http header

member.name: M:AppedoLT.RequestProcessor.WaitUntilByteReceive(System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient,System.Int32)
member.summary: Waiting method until byte receive in given tcp client.
member.param: Tcp client
waiting mili second
